javascript:(function(){if(location.origin!='https://www.amazon.co.jp'||location.pathname!='/s'){alert("%E3%81%93%E3%81%AE%E3%83%96%E3%83%83%E3%82%AF%E3%83%9E%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AC%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%81%AFAmazon.co.jp%E3%81%AE%E6%A4%9C%E7%B4%A2%E7%B5%90%E6%9E%9C%E4%B8%80%E8%A6%A7%E3%81%A7%E5%AE%9F%E8%A1%8C%E3%81%97%E3%81%A6%E3%81%8F%E3%81%A0%E3%81%95%E3%81%84");return;}if(window.confirm('Amazon.co.jp%E3%81%8B%E3%82%89%E5%87%BA%E5%93%81%E3%81%95%E3%82%8C%E3%81%A6%E3%81%84%E3%82%8B%E5%95%86%E5%93%81%E3%81%AE%E3%81%BF%E3%82%92%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99')){let query=location.search,regex=/rh=(.*?)(&|$)/,filter='rh=p_6:AN1VRQENFRJN5';if(query.match(regex)){query=query.replace(regex,filter+'&');}else{query+='&'+filter;}location.href=location.origin+location.pathname+query;}})();
